answers.author: Stan McNutt
answers.text:
One roundtable might be "How to update all governmental coordination policies without rocking the boat"
An example of a complete update finished project is:
http://www.ci.bainbridgeisl.wa.us/governance_coordination_review.aspx 
Having good up-to-date rules of coordination of the organization solves a plethora of problems.   STAN

author: Jared Dailey
text:
Are you attending this year's ICMA Conference in San Jose?  Want to participate even more than you already do during the educational sessions?  Then facilitating a roundtable might be just what you're looking for.
Roundtables are an informal discussion about a specific topic where participants exchange ideas and experiences with each other.  Facilitating an ICMA roundtable is rather simple.  The facilitator, who has some experience or expertise him/herself, keeps the discussion on-point  and flowing.  Facilitators just need to be comfortable remaining in the assigned location for the hour with the possibility that zero, one, a few, or many participants attend.
Attached is a list roundtables that do not have a facilitator as of yet.  If you're interested in being a facilitator, email me and I can answer any questions.
Thank you for your interest.
title: Want to be an ICMA Conference Roundtable Facilitator?
